maincourse.name: Classic Cheeseburger
maincourse.description: Beef burger with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and special sauce, served with French fries.

maincourse.name: Vegetable Pad Thai
maincourse.description: Stir-fried rice noodles with fresh vegetables, egg, peanuts, and tamarind sauce.

maincourse.name: Fish and Chips
maincourse.description: Battered and fried fish fillet served with French fries and tartar sauce.

maincourse.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
maincourse.description: Italian pasta with bacon, egg, parmesan cheese, and black pepper.

maincourse.name: Vegan Burger
maincourse.description: A juicy plant-based burger seasoned with spices, served on a bun with lettuce, tomato, onion, and a variety of vegan sauces.

maincourse.name: Falafel Wrap
maincourse.description: Delicious homemade falafels wrapped in a wheat tortilla, accompanied by hummus, lettuce, tomato, and vegan yogurt sauce.

maincourse.name: BBQ Burger
maincourse.description: Beef burger with homemade BBQ sauce, cheddar cheese, crispy bacon, and caramelized onions, served with French fries.
